sn24.36:1.2: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:1.3: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:2.1: “Rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.2: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:2.6: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:2.7: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’ti.
sn24.36:3.4: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.5: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:3.7: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya, dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.8: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
sn24.36:3.14: api nu taṁ anupādāya evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjeyya:
sn24.36:3.15: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti?
sn24.36:3.17: “Iti kho, bhikkhave, dukkhe sati, dukkhaṁ upādāya dukkhaṁ abhinivissa evaṁ diṭṭhi uppajjati:
sn24.36:3.18: ‘neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā’”ti.
